author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tkstanczak> hmmm, there should be none - from the state perspective and the client setting to zero is equivalent to never set

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tkstanczak> there is no way to differentiate the two without trying to load the history

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tkstanczak> this is why we issue refunds for setting to zero

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tkstanczak> bacause it practically removes the entry from the state

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <chriseth> Ah sorry, I thought I remembered something like that
